title: Countries with the highest proportion of soccer players 2010
summary: This is a bar chart. It shows Proportion of soccer players for 5 number of Countrys.
Country Germany has the highest Proportion of soccer players and The Netherlands has the lowest Proportion of soccer players.
The highest value at Country Germany is 1.9x times more than the lowest value at The Netherlands.

max_summary: This is a bar chart representing Country in the x axis and Proportion of soccer players in the y axis.
The maximum Proportion of soccer players 19.8 is found at Country Germany and the minimum is found at The Netherlands where Country is 10.4.
Country Chile has the second highest value for Proportion of soccer players.
The highest Country Germany has 9.4 more Proportion of soccer players than the lowest Country The Netherlands.
Proportion of soccer players at Country Germany is 19.8 , second place is Chile at 15.7, and thirdly is Paraguay at 14.8.
Considered together, the average Proportion of soccer players in all 5 Countrys is roughly 14.42.
Summing up the values of all Countrys, we get total 72.1.
